name: Shott, Appellant, v. Hudson Coal Co.

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Shott, Appellant, v. Hudson Coal Co.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed for the reasons set forth in the case of Gima v. Hudson Coal Company, filed herewith.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John P. Kelly, with him Rudolph S. Houch and H. T. Newcomb, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Shott, Appellant, v. Hudson Coal Co.
Argued January 18,1933.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
E. G. Marianelli, for appellant.
John P. Kelly, with him Rudolph S. Houch and H. T. Newcomb, for appellee.
March 20, 1933:
